SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local tokens = EffectController():PlayerDataChest():Get_Int( PLAYER_UTILITY_COMPARTMENT_ID_PLAYERS_CREATURES_DIED_THIS_TURN ) if tokens > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_BEAST_3_3_277473", tokens, EffectController() ) end
